description: mu(n) + 1, where mu is the Moebius function.
references: G. H. Hardy and E. M. Wright, An Introduction to the Theory of Numbers. 3rd ed., Oxford Univ. Press, 1954, p. 234.
K. Ireland and M. Rosen, A Classical Introduction to Modern Number Theory. Springer-Verlag, NY, 1982, p. 19.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: with(numtheory); A007423:=n->mobius(n)+1; seq(A007423(k), k=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 24 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
